name: Wonder Wanderer 2
description:
X - Change Gravity 

Dpad - Move Character

Up - open doors and teleport if you are near to a Black X

Down - go down through the platforms

Find and save the frog!

Story: A frog is stuck on the depths of the dungeon wells and you need to help him sending a robot! But every room is filled with gravity switching somehow...can you still make it?

Themes used:

The Gravity is My Enemy

The Gravity is My Enemy done wrong

Instant teletrasportation

Minibeasts
